attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He is clearly one of the few intelligent people left in the world, and is even spreading his intelligence to places badly in need of less ignorance (Namely, America).

A true humanitarian!

rejection.details: You must be a UK resident to set up a petition.  Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
